title: refactor(http-server-connections): inline single-use record_request_latency function
body:
## Summary

The record_request_latency function is called only once (line 163) and is 11 lines long.

## Location
File: src/http/SocketHTTPServer-connections.c
Function: record_request_latency
Lines: 643-655
Called at: connection_finish_request (line 163)

## Pattern
SINGLE_USE_INLINE (HIGH severity)
